title: Are you a giver or a taker?
description: In every workplace, there are three basic kinds of people: givers, takers and matchers. Organizational psychologist Adam Grant breaks down these personalities and offers simple strategies to promote a culture of generosity and keep self-serving employees from taking more than their share.
author: Adam Grant
keywords: TED, talks, anthropology, behavioral economics, business, collaboration, community, leadership, motivation, personal growth, personality, psychology, self, society, work
